name: say-your-harmony
description: Meta-Analysis Learning Loop: Experimental Validation of Self-Improving Agent Orchestration Systems

plugins.name: say-your-harmony
plugins.description: 4-Phase Development Orchestration System: Planning, Design, Implementation, Operation. Features 10 specialized agents (harmony, planner, architect, builder, operator, explorer, documenter, meta-analyzer, meta-aggregator, phase-meta-extractor), meta-analysis feedback loop, N-way parallel execution.
